A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
As an educator I look at all students the same way\, women or men. I don't even care. 

However\, if you want good grades\, you have to work hard for it. This movie is counter to that thesis\, and in a very strong\, willful way.

It is a bad influence on kids. I am very disappointed in the mainstream media\, which in their eagerness to push a feminist agenda\, ignores this important value for a society to succeed: meritocracy.
